traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Lightning Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Repulsion Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 40 feet away from the dragon.
